name: WRO
description:
A first person racing game based on race maps from Quake and Warsow as well as  Trackmania acrobatic tracks.  10 levels. You have a wall jump and move very fast Fully customizable game physics via config file. The name WRO is a reference to the songs BRO and YRO by Racer X.

WASD move. Space or Right Mouse Button to jump. Custom keybinds and volume controls coming soon

V1.1
Added 2 new tracks and changed up some of the old ones.
Improved physics code to handle non 90 walls
Added speed run mode. 
Added announcer and the ability to mute audio 

Weapon Asset from https://mehrasaur.itch.io/weapons-3d
